BALANCE_LIMITS.TITLE: Balance Limit
BALANCE_LIMITS.LABEL: Balance Limit
BALANCE_LIMITS.PENDING:
Balance limit increase requested on {{date_requested}} to {{amount}}.
 This new limit will take effect on {{date_affected}}
BALANCE_LIMITS.DISABLED_MESSAGE: Balance limit disabled for current domain

EXPLAIN.SMALLER: This limit change is smaller (or equal) than the current limit, and will take effect immediately.
EXPLAIN.LARGER: This is an increase to this balance limit, and will only take effect within 7 days.

NEW_LIMIT.LABEL: New Balance Limit
NEW_LIMIT.DESCRIPTION: The maximum amount of money to be held in player current balance. The different will be automatically withdrawn to the contra account.

CURRENT_LIMIT.LABEL: Current Balance Limit
CURRENT_LIMIT.DESCRIPTION: The current balance limit for this player

CHANGE.CONFIRMATION_MESSAGE: Are you sure you want to decrease the amount from "{{amount_from}}" to "{{amount_to}}"?

SAVE.ERROR: Balance limit could not be saved, please try again.

BALANCE_LIMITS.NAME: Player Balance Limit
BALANCE_LIMITS.DESCRIPTION: Allow player balance limit to be specified.

PLAYTIME_LIMIT_SERVICE.NAME: Playtime Limit Service
PLAYTIME_LIMIT_SERVICE.DESCRIPTION: Allow Playtime limit to be specified.
